name: Rare Clavi Gnat
description: Rare Clavi Gnats bat at the spiny fruits of the Clavi Cactus to tenderize their fleshy pulp. Once sufficiently softened, these tasty morsels emit a gentle glow signaling that they are ready for consumption. The fruits are then digested by the Rare Magical's highly specialized gastrointestinal system, skin and all! The Monster's own spiky exterior recalls the age-old expression, you are what you beat. Fruit punch, anyone?
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 1 hr 30 min, Enhanced Time: 19 hr 7 min 30 sec
